text: Onon ummathoe ʙudand, ki dar haqiqat darguzastaand. On ci onho kardand, az oni onhost va on ci sumo mekuned, az oni sumost va sumoro az a'moli onho namepursand. (Ojat dalolat ʙa on mekunad, inson takja ʙar maxluqho makunad va ʙa nasaʙho firefta nasavad.). Va kase ʙa jak pajomʙar kufr ovarad, ʙa tamomi pajomʙaron kufr ovardaast
